title.text: e~c;k 0~~ Computers and Translation a dynamic new quarterly journal in a rapidly growing sector of the computing community

abstractContent.text: Featured articles by experts-like Naomi Baron, Muriel Vasconcellos, Masaru Tomita, Tim Johnson and Veronica Lawson-range from the promise of machine translation to sentence disambiguation, and to book reviews of relevant publications.
As machine translation grows in importance, linguists, translators and government bureaus will find Computers and Translation an indispensable ally.
The intellectual, commercial and research activities of all these groups will be advanced by up-to-date information on an increasingly essential and complex field.
